favourite.article: After incarnation and human living, the Lord Jesus went to the cross and died in order to accomplish an all-inclusive death. The main purpose of His death was to release the divine life, the release of the divine life is the dispensing of the divine life.
Praise the Lord for God's economy, which is to make man the same as He is.
Waited so long to find the music for this song! Thank You Lord for Your wonderful economy!
